## createDOMView() function

Create a fully-configured DOM app service

Returns a flat service with all signals and view primitives, plus DOM-specific helpers (on, t) and a mount function.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createDOMView: () => DOMSvc;
```

**Returns:**

[DOMSvc](../domsvc/)

## Example

```typescript
import { createDOMView } from '@lattice/view/presets/dom';

const { el, signal, computed, map, on, mount } = createDOMView();

const App = () => {
  const count = signal(0);
  return el('div')(
    el('h1')('Counter'),
    el('p')(computed(() => `Count: ${count()}`)),
    el('button').ref(on('click', () => count((c) => c + 1)))('Increment')
  );
};

document.body.appendChild(mount(App()));
```
